name: Heng Wu 0001
content: the academic personal website of Heng WU - Heng WU Heng WU CCF/ACM/IEEE memberAssociate Professor Technology Center of Software Engineering Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences Follow Beijing, China Email ResearchGate LinkedIn Github Google Scholar ORCIDI am an associate professor at the Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences (ISCAS), where I lead the Operating Systems and Distributed Computing Group. I obtained Ph.D. from ISCAS in 2014 (advisor: Prof. Tao Huang), M.Eng. from National University of Defense Technology (NUDT) in 2008 (advisor: Prof. Quanyuan WU), and B.Eng. from Changsha University of Science and Technology (CSUST) in 2005.AddressRoom 607, No.5 Building, Technology Center of Software EngineeringInstitute of Software, Chinese Academy of SciencesNo. 4, South Fourth Street, ZhongGuanCun, Beijing, 100190, ChinaNews1 paper accepted by ICPP 2025(CCF B). Congratulations to Diaohan LUO.1 paper accepted by JCST 2025(CCF B). Congratulations to Heran GAO.1 paper accepted by HPDC 2024(CCF B). Congratulations to Zichao YANG.1 paper accepted by ICSOC 2023(CCF B). Congratulations to JIanfeng SHI.1 paper accepted by RTSS 2023(CCF A). Congratulations to JIanfeng SHI.1 paper accepted by ICPP 2023(CCF B). Congratulations to Diaohan LUO.1 paper accepted by ICWS 2023(CCF B). Congratulations to Hao ZENG.1 paper accepted by IEEE transactions on computers(CCF A). Congratulations to Zichao YANG.1 paper accepted by DASFAA 2023(CCF B). Congratulations to Jianfeng SHI.1 paper accepted by ACM SoCC 2022(CCF B). Congratulations to Yuewen WU.StudentsPresent (MSc + PhD):PhDWang LIU (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZHANG), 2025-ZiChao YANG (UCAS, with Prof. Hua ZHONG,), 2021-Diaohan LUO (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZHANG), 2021-Jianfeng SHI (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZHANG), 2020-Heran GAO (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZHANG), 2019-MScZhaoxuan WANG(Najing, UCAS), 2023-Yiwen XU(Najing, UCAS), 2023-Past:PhDJianfeng SHI (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZHANG), 2021-2025Yuanjia XU (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZHANG), 2017-2023Yuewen WU (UCAS, with Prof. Hua ZHONG), 2015-2021MScYingjie JU (UCAS, with Prof.Tao HHUANG), 2022-2025, (301医院, beijing)Aoluo ZHANG (UCAS, with Prof.Tao HHUANG), 2022-2025, (农行总行ABC, beijing)Xing Lv (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2022-2025, (头条Toutiao, hangzhou)Hao GUO (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2021-2024, (阿里云Alibaba, beijing)Tian YU (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2020-2023, (北京大学长沙计算与数字经济学院,Jianxing ZHU (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2021-2024, (阿里云Alibaba, beijing)Hao GUO (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2021-2024, (阿里云Alibaba, beijing)Tian YU (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2020-2023, (北京大学长沙计算与数字经济学院, changsha)Rongzhou LUO (UCAS), 2020-2023, (东方财富, shanghai)Chen YANG (UCAS), 2019-2022 (百度Baidu, shanghai)Chengzhi LI (GXU, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2019-2022 (滴滴DiDi, beijing)Bowen YAN (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2018-2021 (腾讯Tencent, chengdu)He LIU (UCAS, with Dr. Gang XU), 2018-2021 (头条Toutiao, beijing)Ting TANG (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2018-2021 (美团MeiTuan, beijing)YinGang SU (UCAS, with Dr. Gang XU), 2017-2020 (美团MeiTuan, beijing)Yue ZHANG (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2017-2020 (阿里云Alibaba, beijing)Zhonghao SHI (UCAS, with Prof. Wenbo ZhANG), 2017-2020 (网易NetEASE, hangzhou)
